name: 12 UX Templates
description:
12 User Experience Templates


You can modify them to suit your project's and portfolio's needs!


Here you can find 12 Figma User Experience Processes Templates made for all designers:

  1. Persona
  2. Usability testing - Preparation
  3. Usability testing - Conduct Qualitative
  4. Usability testing - Conduct Quantitative
  5. Usability testing - Report
  6. Competitors Analysis
  7. Roadmap
  8. Customer Journey Map
  9. Value Proposition Canvas
  10. User story mapping
  11. Identify Ideas
  12. Process Evaluation Matrix 



You can choose templates that absolutely suit your project's process and use it with different transformations. 


You can use these User Experience Templates for your projects to help speed up your workflow or to prepare your portfolio case âœ¨
